title: LG set to launch smartphone powered by own Odin CPU | Trusted Reviews
description: ![LG G3]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Qualcomm probably won’t have things quite so completely its own way as it hasin recent times.**Read More:[Best Mobile Phone 2014](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-smartphone_round-up)**
